summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help improve the federal government. We alert department heads to the recommendations where they can save the most money, address issues on our High Risk List , or significantly improve government operations. This report outlines our 12 priority recommendations to the Department of Agriculture as of April 2020. For example, we have recommended that USDA better...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: U.S. Department of Agriculture
